name: who's better: humans or robots
description:
A game where you're on a show,  comparing AI and humans. 

And you gotta show them who's the boss through your puzzle and platforming skills

or so I intended.

this project was a terrible and stressfull experience, I crunched so hard yet accomplished so little. am never gonna do this ever again, even for a big jam such as this. and I had to publish it so early because of life stuff ugh and there's a power outrage uuuugh.
